item.title: Master Stone Mason (Level 13)
item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.title: Master Author (Level 12)
item.description: Made 2^Level commits using git commit.

item.title: Master Miller (Level 12)
item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 7410 times with git add -p.

item.title: Merchant (Level 4)
item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.title: Master Seamstress (Level 11)
item.description: amended a commit with git commit --amend.

item.title: Master Locksmith (Level 10)
item.description: Add Signed-off-by line at the end of the commit log message using git commit -s.

item.title: Master Banker (Level 8)
item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.title: Apprentice Carpenter (Level 3)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Apprentice Carpenter (Level 2)
item.description: Custom git hooks are installed which help catch issues before they are shared.

item.title: Master Socialite (Level 10)
item.description: pushed a branch to a remote repository using git push

item.title: Master Collector (Level 12)
item.description: Fetches named heads or tags from another repository with git fetch

item.title: Master Archivist (Level 7)
item.description: Prepare each commit with its patch in one file per commit with git format-patch

item.title: Master Historian (Level 8)
item.description: Investigate the commit log using git log.

item.description: Added an external repository with git remote add.

item.description: Added files to the index area for inclusion in the next commit with git add

item.description: Join two or more development histories together with git merge.

item.description: Add only part of a file to the stage 4041 times with git add -p.

item.title: Master Investigator (Level 8)
item.description: Used git blame to annotate a file with information about how each line changed.

item.title: Master Hunter (Level 7)
item.description: Used git bisect to perform a binary search to find which change introduced a bug.

item.title: Master Butcher (Level 7)
item.description: Performed an interactive rebase using git rebase -i.
